name: Websty
description: The text similarity analysis service used to intelligently determine the similarity between different documents. It is based on semantic analysis, which identifies and compares the meanings of words and phrases appearing in texts. The result is the position (x, y) of the document in a two-dimensional space, where the distance between the points reflects the degree of similarity between the texts.
authentication: Yes, user should create an account on the Clarin-PL website
